revised_title: Human Sacral Index and Curvature in Different Races
tldr: The author presents a study on the sacral index and curvature of various human races. They compared the results with previous research and classified the races into three categories based on their sacral index. The study also examined the sacral curvature in 236 cases, finding differences between sexes and races. The European and Mongolian races showed the greatest curvature, while the Negro and Polynesian races had less curvature.
